body:
Hi,

I also get this issue with Windows 7 x64 and the latest version:

```
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-alpha.18> $env:PROCESSOR_ARCHITECTURE
AMD64
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-alpha.18> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
CLRVersion
WSManStackVersion              3.0
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.18
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
PSEdition                      Core
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha


PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-alpha.18> Get-CimInstance -ClassName Win32_OperatingSystem
Get-CimInstance : Unable to find an entry point named 'GetCurrentThread' in DLL 'api-ms-win-core-processthreads-l1-1-2.dll'.
At line:1 char:1
+ Get-CimInstance -ClassName Win32_OperatingSystem
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (root\cimv2:Win32_OperatingSystem:String) [Get-CimInstance], EntryPointNotFoundException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : CimCmdlet_EntryPointNotFoundException,Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimCmdlets.GetCimInstanceCommand

PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-alpha.18> $Error[0] | fl * -Force


writeErrorStream      : True
PSMessageDetails      :
OriginInfo            :
Exception             : System.EntryPointNotFoundException: Unable to find an entry point named 'GetCurrentThread' in DLL 'api-ms-win-core-processthreads-l1-1-2.dll'.
                           at GetCurrentThread()
                           at Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.OperationHandle.ReleaseHandle()
                           at System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle.InternalDispose()
                           at Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Internal.Operations.CimOperation.Dispose(Boolean disposing)
                           at Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Internal.Operations.CimAsyncCallbacksReceiverBase.DisposeOperationWhenPossibleWorker(CimOperation cimOperation)
                           at Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Internal.Operations.CimAsyncCallbacksReceiverBase.InvokeWhenOperationIsSet(Action`1 action)
                           at Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Internal.Operations.CimAsyncObserverProxyBase`1.ProcessNativeCallback(OperationCallbackProcessingContext
                        callbackProcessingContext, T currentItem, Boolean moreResults, MiResult operationResult, String errorMessage, InstanceHandle errorDetailsHandle)
                           at Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Internal.Operations.CimAsyncInstanceObserverProxy.InstanceResultCallback(OperationCallbackProcessingContext
                        callbackProcessingContext, OperationHandle operationHandle, InstanceHandle instanceHandle, Boolean moreResults, MiResult operationResult, String errorMessage,
                        InstanceHandle errorDetailsHandle)
                           at Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.ExceptionSafeInstanceResultCallback.InvokeUserCallback()
                           at Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.Native.OperationCallbacks.InvokeWithUserFilteredExceptionHandler(Action tryBody, Func`2 userFilter, Action`1 catchBody)
TargetObject          : root\cimv2:Win32_OperatingSystem
CategoryInfo          : NotSpecified: (root\cimv2:Win32_OperatingSystem:String) [Get-CimInstance], EntryPointNotFoundException
FullyQualifiedErrorId : CimCmdlet_EntryPointNotFoundException,Microsoft.Management.Infrastructure.CimCmdlets.GetCimInstanceCommand
ErrorDetails          :
InvocationInfo        : System.Management.Automation.InvocationInfo
ScriptStackTrace      : at <ScriptBlock>, <No file>: line 1
PipelineIterationInfo : {0, 1}
```
